description: Java source code for the EventController class, a REST controller managing CRUD operations for Event entities in a Spring Boot application.

classes.name: EventController
classes.description: REST controller for managing Event entities, providing endpoints for CRUD operations.

methods.name: createEvent
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new event based on provided EventRequest payload.

methods.name: updateEvent
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing event identified by id with new data.

methods.name: getEvent
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve an event by its id.

methods.name: listEvents
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all events.

methods.name: deleteEvent
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to delete an event by its id.
